title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies for Online High School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education experience and LMS platform usage proficiency
context.additional_context: A course intensively developing competencies in designing and revising online science instruction. Applies core educational design standards based on expert consultations using the Delphi method.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose improvements for 3+ learning objects (LOs) suitable for online science instruction
Educational design standard priorities can be determined by applying a Delphi technique-based consensus-building process
Learners can design and prototype 1+ modifiable science experiment content in an LMS environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
